#!/bin/bash

while true
do
  echo 'å¼€å§‹éƒ¨ç½²ï¼š'+$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')

  rm ./NotionNext/public/sitemap.xml

  cd ./NotionNext
  yarn export

  cp -rf ./out/* ../bothsavage.github.io

  cd ../bothsavage.github.io
  time=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
  git add *
  git commit -a -m "auto $time"
  git push
  echo 'ç»“æŸéƒ¨ç½²ï¼š'+"auto $time"
  cd ..

	#ä¼‘æ¯20åˆ†é’Ÿ
  sleep 1200
done

# Use an official Alpine runtime as a parent image
FROM alpine:latest

# Install necessary tools
RUN apk add --no-cache bash git yarn curl

# Set the working directory in the container to /app
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the deploy.sh file from your host to your current location.
COPY deploy.sh .

# Add execute permissions to your script
RUN chmod +x deploy.sh

RUN git config --global user.email "xxxx@163.com"
RUN git config --global user.name "xxxx"

# Run your script when the container launches
CMD ["./deploy.sh"]

git remote remove origin

git remote add origin https://[TOKEN]@github.com[USER]/[REPO]
